Description: DOXA 8 days Swiss vintage men's mechanical wristwatch Dear Buyers, read carefully before making bids! Please look through all photos and read all description - you buy exactly what you see on the photos. Photos are real! Before bidding – please take a firm decision that you really need this item! I respect and follow to eBay Contracts and Rules and I expect the same from you, my buyers! If you have any questions - please email me before bidding. Also view my feedback! Good luck! ANY DEFECTS NOT MENTIONED BUT VISIBLE IN THE PICTURES WILL BE CONSIDERED AS DESCRIBED Description:Rare vintage Swiss mechanical wristwatch Doxa. The watch in fully working order – you can use it for everyday wearing; or if you are collector Doxa watch will be super addition to your collection - the price of this watch increases every year. It has metal argentan case with hand winding crown, on a face - plastic. The dial is original but only professionally repainted and perfectly restored. The movement - mechanical, with handwinding - super quality. On the dial, hours markers and watch hands are fluorescent(luminous in the dark). This Doxa watch is used but are in good working and cosmetic condition as seen on the images below. This watch has been serviced. Watchband is added as a gift. Our goal is to make sure you are a happy buyer and you really pleasant from shopping at our store. Positive feedback is appreciated. Technical details:Case diameter – 65 mmCase diameter (crown include) – 83.5 mmCase thickness - 20.2 mmDial (glass) diameter - 58 mm -->
Title: DOXA 8 days Swiss vintage men's mechanical pocket watch
